name: Face Veneer
Prod_desc: We supply face veneer in flitch (leaved bundles) and stitched sheet form (layons) to decorative plywood manufacturers, OEM’s and furniture manufacturers. Our customer oriented, demand centric approach has helped us become one of the top producers of face veneer in the world.Our customer oriented, demand centric approach has helped us become one of the top producers of face veneer in the world.
Prod_size: 1. Recon Veneers can be made available in custom thicknesses starting from 0.20 mm to 2.5 mm and lengths 2.20 - 3.15 mtrs. They are normally available in sizes 2500x630 mm  2. Natural veneers are available in thicknesses 0.40 - 0.55 mm  3. Flitch form (leaved bundles). Lengths 500 to 3300 mm  4. Stitched veneer Layons sheet in sizes with lengths 600 - 3100 mm and widths 600 - 1550 mm
Prod_usps: Ready stock of Natural Veneers , Custom size and design , Manufactured according to european quality standards. , Inspection and delivery of decorative veneer to our clients. , Modern European veneer slicing and processing line. , Availability of 150 designs. , Slice and provide custom thicknesses and grades. , Own company plants producing commercial veneers.
Prod_specification: We provide ideal solutions for personal and office spaces using indigenous technology that gives your furniture a distinctive edge in terms of craft and endurance.
